accounts.name: from
docs: The token account to burn from (must have sufficient balance)

accounts.name: authority
docs: Must match the mint's authority (or the account's delegate)

accounts.name: user_stake
docs: The user's pdas where we track their stake data

accounts.name: account
docs: The token account to close (must be empty)

accounts.name: destination
docs: Destination of the reclaimed SOL

accounts.name: authority
docs: The close-authority of `account`

accounts.name: account
docs: The token account to freeze (must be initialized)

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint under which this account exists

accounts.name: freeze_authority
docs: Must match the mint's freeze_authority

accounts.name: stake_vault
docs: The associated token account owned by the pool PDA to hold stake tokens

accounts.name: reward_vault
docs: The associated token account owned by the pool PDA to hold reward tokens

accounts.name: to
docs: The token account to receive newly minted tokens

accounts.name: authority
docs: Must match the mint's authority

accounts.name: admin
docs: The admin of the pool

accounts.name: staker
docs: The user who wants to stake

accounts.name: pool
docs: The global pool

accounts.name: stake_vault
docs: The vault holding all stake tokens

accounts.name: user_stake_account
docs: The user's token account holding stake tokens

accounts.name: user_stake
docs: The user's pdas where we1000700000000030 track their stake data

accounts.name: account
docs: The token account to thaw

accounts.name: mint
docs: The same mint used when freezing

accounts.name: freeze_authority
docs: Must match the mint's freeze_authority

accounts.name: stake_vault
docs: The vault holding all stake tokens

accounts.name: user_stake_account
docs: The user's token account holding stake tokens

accounts.name: user_stake
docs: The user's pdas where we track their stake data

errors.name: RewardOverflow
errors.msg: Pending rewards exceed maximum payout limit.

types.name: LiquidityPoolAMM
docs: AMM

fields.name: pool_name
docs: Name of the pool like SOL/USDC

fields.name: token_a_mint
docs: Name of the token0 token like SOL

fields.name: token_b_mint
docs: Name of the token1 token like USDC

fields.name: vault_a
docs: it store the token0 tokens e.g SOL

fields.name: vault_b
docs: it store the token1 tokens e.g USDC

fields.name: reserve_a
docs: it reserve the total tokens of token0 for swaps

fields.name: reserve_b
docs: it reserve the total tokens of token1 for swaps

fields.name: total_lp_supply
docs: it's total supply of the mint tokens which provide to the LPs

fields.name: fee_bps
docs: Fees for the swaps

fields.name: bump
docs: Initali Pool bump which represents between 0-255

types.name: StakingPool
docs: staking

fields.name: stake_mint
docs: The mint of the token users stake.

fields.name: reward_mint
docs: The mint of the token used for rewards.

fields.name: stake_vault
docs: Vault that holds all deposited stake tokens.

fields.name: reward_vault
docs: Vault that holds all reward tokens (funded in advance by admin).

fields.name: admin
docs: Admin/owner of this pool (can change reward rate and top up rewards).

fields.name: total_staked
docs: Total amount of stake tokens currently staked.

fields.name: reward_rate_per_day
docs: Reward rate per second, scaled by 1e12 (to allow fractional).
E.g. if you want to pay out 1 token per second, store 1_000_000_000_000.

fields.name: reward_per_token_stored
docs: Accumulated reward per staked token, scaled by 1e12.
Updated on each stake/unstake/claim.

fields.name: last_update_time
docs: Last timestamp (in Unix seconds) when we updated `reward_per_token_stored`.

types.name: UserStake
docs: Each user’s individual stake account

fields.name: pool
docs: Which staking pool this belongs to.

fields.name: staker
docs: The user who staked.

fields.name: amount_staked
docs: How many stake tokens this user has deposited.

fields.name: reward_debt
docs: The user’s “reward debt” = `amount_staked * reward_per_token_stored` at the last update.
When we accrue new rewards, we compare current vs. this to figure out “owed” rewards.

fields.name: pending_rewards
docs: Accumulated but unclaimed rewards.
